title: Erigon v2.39.0 + Prysm v3.1.2: BuildMissedIndices: TransactionsIdx: at=8430000-8440000, pre index building, expect: 18446744073544445783, got 572407
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `v2.39.0`

Concensus Layer: Prysm

Chain/Network: Goerli

#### Expected behaviour

Sync properly

#### Actual behaviour

Erigon + Prysm are both stuck in error looping. Both run with snapshot sync

Erigon looping with:

```
[INFO] [03-03|14:23:26.658] [1/15 Snapshots] Fetching torrent files metadata
11
[INFO] [03-03|14:23:26.660] [snapshots] Blocks Stat                  blocks=8430k indices=8430k alloc=1.4GB sys=1.8GB
10
[EROR] [03-03|14:23:26.690] Staged Sync                              err="[1/15 Snapshots] BuildMissedIndices: TransactionsIdx: at=8430000-8440000, pre index building, expect: 18446744073544445783, got 572407"
9
[INFO] [03-03|14:23:27.554] [1/15 Snapshots] Fetching torrent files metadata
8
[INFO] [03-03|14:23:27.556] [snapshots] Blocks Stat                  blocks=8430k indices=8430k alloc=1.5GB sys=1.8GB
7
[EROR] [03-03|14:23:27.586] Staged Sync                              err="[1/15 Snapshots] BuildMissedIndices: TransactionsIdx: at=8430000-8440000, pre index building, expect: 18446744073544445783, got 572407"
6
[INFO] [03-03|14:23:28.722] [1/15 Snapshots] Fetching torrent files metadata
5
[INFO] [03-03|14:23:28.723] [snapshots] Blocks Stat                  blocks=8430k indices=8430k alloc=896.4MB sys=1.8GB
4
[EROR] [03-03|14:23:28.754] Staged Sync                              err="[1/15 Snapshots] BuildMissedIndices: TransactionsIdx: at=8430000-8440000, pre index building, expect: 18446744073544445783, got 572407"
3
[INFO] [03-03|14:23:29.552] [1/15 Snapshots] Fetching torrent files metadata
2
[INFO] [03-03|14:23:29.554] [snapshots] Blocks Stat                  blocks=8430k indices=8430k alloc=1005.1MB sys=1.8GB
1
[EROR] [03-03|14:23:29.585] Staged Sync                              err="[1/15 Snapshots] BuildMissedIndices: TransactionsIdx: at=8430000-8440000, pre index building, expect: 18446744073544445783, got 572407"

```

This `expect` number looks off

Prysm looping with:

```
time="2023-03-03 14:25:26" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x560e6c60e7cf15f7ca64dafdd71395fd06dd0ab14cacc2cd6579ba383f6f86c3 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=5082497)" prefix=initial-sync
15
time="2023-03-03 14:25:26" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 59 starting from  0xc737f9a0... 5082561/5112127 - estimated time remaining 26m0s" blocksPerSecond=18.9 peers=44 prefix=initial-sync
14
time="2023-03-03 14:25:26" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0xff1d2bc320a83977f4ddeb4c2473f86e75625faeb30d31ddf1d41e09f4aca101 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=5082561)" prefix=initial-sync
13
time="2023-03-03 14:25:26" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 53 starting from  0x2dfcbe79... 5082625/5112127 - estimated time remaining 22m45s" blocksPerSecond=21.6 peers=44 prefix=initial-sync
12
time="2023-03-03 14:25:26" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x14f403cf63ec9e670a282da5eed299b5c41c3ac029627fd016d79d9cbe19084f (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=5082625)" prefix=initial-sync
11
time="2023-03-03 14:25:35" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 52 starting from  0x846298b9... 5082177/5112127 - estimated time remaining 20m37s" blocksPerSecond=24.2 peers=41 prefix=initial-sync
10
time="2023-03-03 14:25:35" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="could not process block in batch: block 0x2c16cb971a21 is not a descendant of the current finalized block slot 5082208, 0x2c16cb971a21 != 0x7edaeb4924c4" prefix=initial-sync
9
time="2023-03-03 14:25:35" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 54 starting from  0xba9515b0... 5082241/5112127 - estimated time remaining 18m31s" blocksPerSecond=26.9 peers=41 prefix=initial-sync
8
time="2023-03-03 14:25:42" level=warning msg="Skip processing batched blocks" error="could not process block in batch: got an unexpected error in JSON-RPC response: 503 Service Unavailable: no healthy upstream: received an undefined ee error" prefix=initial-sync
7
```

If needed, will dig out CLI args on request
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
